item.title: Introduction
item.description: Hello world, My name is Kuncoro Adjie. Simple person who love typing. I use GNU/Linux everyday on my potato laptop. The distro that I use is arch linux with bspwm as its window manager which previously I used i3wm and dwm. I’m currently starting to explore the front-end of the web. Thanks for dropping by.
item.content:
Hello world, My name is Kuncoro Adjie. Simple person who love typing.

I use GNU/Linux everyday on my potato laptop. The distro that I use is arch linux with bspwm as its window manager which previously I used i3wm and dwm.

I’m currently starting to explore the front-end of the web.

Thanks for dropping by.
